summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Translatify (WheelStat) app - All requested features working correctly: Login, Dashboard, Refinish Queue with New Order creation, Language translation to Spanish, and Translation API endpoint
passed_tests: Health check endpoint - /api/health returns healthy status
Admin login with credentials digitalebookdepot@gmail.com / Admin123!
Dashboard loads without errors - displays stats and order columns
Orders API - GET /api/orders returns order list
Stats API - GET /api/stats returns department and product counts
Departments API - GET /api/departments returns department list
Refinish Queue API - GET /api/refinish-queue returns queue entries
Refinish Queue Stats - GET /api/refinish-queue/stats returns status counts
Create New Refinish Order - POST /api/refinish-queue/create-new creates order and queue entry
Refinish Order Validation - Invalid product type returns 400 error
Translation API - POST /api/translate to Spanish works correctly
Translation API - English target returns original text
Translation API - Vietnamese translation works
Translation API - Empty texts array handled correctly
Product Types API - GET /api/product-types returns all types
Rim Sizes API - GET /api/rim-sizes returns sizes and cut statuses
UI - Refinish Queue page loads with New Order button visible
UI - New Order modal opens with all required fields
UI - Language selector dropdown shows all language options
UI - Spanish translation changes all static UI elements correctly
seed_data_creation: Created test refinish orders during testing (TEST-RF-* prefix)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features tested and working: 1) Login with admin credentials works, 2) Dashboard loads with all stats and order columns, 3) Refinish Queue page accessible via header button, 4) New Order button in Refinish Queue creates orders directly (returns {order, refinish_entry} structure), 5) Language change to Spanish translates all static UI elements, 6) Translation API endpoint /api/translate works with Gemini via Emergent LLM Key. Dynamic translation of database content (customer_name, wheel_specs, notes) is integrated in DashboardPage via useDynamicTranslation hook.
